head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MARBLESTONE, ROBERT ANDREW, PH.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MARBLESTONE, ROBERT ANDREW, PH.D.

block.p: MARBLESTONE--Robert Andrew, Ph.D., died on January 26, 2007. He was the beloved and cherished son of Shirley Marblestone and the late Mortimer Marblestone. He is survived by his loving brother Howard, two nieces, five great-nieces and nephews, and a son, Adam. He was a practicing clinical psychologist for many years. Funeral was Sunday, January 28 at 2 pm at the Community Synagogue, 160 Port Washington Blvd., Port Washington.

MARBLESTONE--Robert Andrew, Ph.D., died on January 26, 2007. He was the beloved and cherished son of Shirley Marblestone and the late Mortimer Marblestone. He is survived by his loving brother Howard, two nieces, five great-nieces and nephews, and a son, Adam. He was a practicing clinical psychologist for many years. Funeral was Sunday, January 28 at 2 pm at the Community Synagogue, 160 Port Washington Blvd., Port Washington.
